doc.name: mobileControlDo
doc.summary: Execute specific behaviors of native mobile controls created using mobileControlCreate.

example.p: // set the focus for a multi-line text field

history.changed: Added support for android player and scroller
Changed to mobileControlDo from iphoneControlDo and updated for the native Android browser
Added support for Multi-line Native Text Field

description.overview: Use the mobileControlDo command to execute behaviors specific to a particular native mobile control created using mobileControlCreate. An action may require or have a number of optional extra parameters which are defined in the values section below.

parameter.name: idOrName
parameter.description: The id or name of the control.

option.description: Move forward through the history (wraps the goForward method of UIWebView).
Move backward through the history (wraps the goBack method of UIWebView).
Reload the current page (wraps the reload method of UIWebView).
Stop loading the current page (wraps the stopLoading method of UIWebView).
Loads as page consisting of the given htmlText with the given baseUrl (wraps theloadHtmlString method of UIWebView). Takes the following additional parameters:
Evaluates the given JavaScript script in the context of the current page (wraps the stringByEvaluationJavaScriptFromString method of UIWebView). Takes the following additional parameter:
Makes the scroll indicators flash momentarily.
Start playing the content of the player.
Pause the content at the current position.
Stop playing the content of the player.
Make the content ready to play, but don't actually commence playback.
Start seeking forward through the content of the player.
Start seeking backward through the content of the player.
Stop seeking through the content of the player.

option.item: snapshot | snapshot exactly, time, [ maxWidth, maxHeight ] (iOS Only)
option.description: Take a snapshot of the movie at time milliseconds from the beginning. If the 'exactly' form is specified the frame produced is as close as possible to time, otherwise the nearest keyframe is used. The snapshot is made available as a new image object cloned from the templateImage, with data in the format as specified by the global paintCompression property. Takes the following additional parameters:

value.name: maxWidth (optional)
value.description: If maxWidth and maxHeight are specified, the snapshot is scaled to fit within a rectangle of that size but preserving the frame's aspect ratio.

value.name: maxHeight (optional)
value.description: If maxWidth and maxHeight are specified, the snapshot is scaled to fit within a rectangle of that size but preserving the frame's aspect ratio.

option.description: Focus on the control, displaying the keyboard if necessary.

options.title: Multi-line Text Input Specific Actions (iOS Only)

option.description: Focus on the control, displaying the keyboard if necessary.
Ensures the given text range is visible in the view by changing the scroll of the field.

value.name: rangeStart
value.description: The start index of the text that is to be made visible.

value.name: rangeLength
value.description: The length of the text that is to be made visible.
